column1: #Text=You know, Maggie Thatcher broke that glass ceiling.

#Text=She destroyed the North of England, as Minister of Education took my milk away when I was in school, got re-elected by going to war over a sheep infested island that really belongs to another country.
#Text=This isn't about women...they can be just as corrupt and evil as men in politcs.
#Text=I don't recall gnashing and whaling when Campbell was obliterated by Chretien.
#Text=And look how that turned out with the Sponsorship Scandal.

#Text=Clinton lost because Trump knew he had to carry a few mid-western states and Florida, Pennsylvania and there were alot of pissed off people there not buying the establishment and elitism that was the Clinton brand.
#Text=He tapped into the I will give you a voice because all those in these states are hearing is white privilege but they see nothing but jobs lost and rusting factories.
#Text=Will everyone be happy of Marine Le Pen gets elected?
#Text=Or if Kellie Leitch wins the Conservative ballot?
#Text=Would you be happy with a far right wing women in power?
#Text=Sarah Palin was on a Presidential ticket and I don't recall any wailing when she and McCain were defeated.

#Text=The over the top reactions, the oh my God what do I tell my children, I don't feel safe now, we're doomed, doomed I tell you.... get a grip of yourselves, choose wisely next election, get involved in mid-terms and choose to back the best candidate reg rd less of ethnic origin or what reproductive equipment they have.
